Completamente rediseñado para crear un aspecto moderno, pero conservando el toque clásico Aeon. Täysin uudelleensuunniteltu moderni ulkoasu, kuitenkin tuntuen klassiselta Aeon:lta. complètement remanié pour créer une apparence moderne, tout en conservant l'esprit classique d'Aeon. Totalement revu pour créer un look moderne, en gardant l'expérience Aeon. עיצוב חדש היוצר מראה מודרני אך משמר את ההרגשה של Aeon הקלאסי. Potpuno preoblikovan moderan izgled, uz zadržani klasični Aeon osjećaj. Teljesen áttervezett modern kinézet, de megtartva a klasszikus Aeon érzetet. Endurhannað nútímalegt útlit í anda Aeon. Pilnai atnaujinta, kad sukurtų modernią išvaizdą, išlaikant klasikinio Aeon pojūtį. Direka semula sepenuhnya untuk hasilkan penampilan modern, tetapi masih mengekalkan penampilan Aeon klasik. Helt redesignet for å gi deg en moderne utforming, samtidig som man beholder den klassiske Aeon følelsen. Volledig opnieuw ontworpen om een ​​moderne look te creëren, met behoud van het klassieke Aeon gevoel. Całkowicie przeprojektowana skóra Aeon, o nowoczesnym wyglądzie, zachowując klasyczny układ skóry Aeon. Design completamente novo para criar um look moderno, mantendo o feeling do Aeon Clássico. Completamente redesenhado para criar um visual moderno enquanto retém o toque clássico Aeon. полностью переделенная, модернизированная классическая обложка Aeon. Kompletne prepracovaný dizajn s moderným vzhľadom pri zachovaní klasického štýlu Aeon. Totalt omarbetad för att skapa ett modernt utseende, samtidigt som man behåller den klassiska Aeon-känslan. การออกแบบใหม่หมดจด เพื่อสร้างรูปลักษณ์ทันสมัย, ​​ขณะที่ยังคงความรู้สึกคลาสสิคของ Aeon. Thiết kế lại hoàn toàn để tạo nên một phong cách hiện đại, trong khi đó vẫn duy trì một cảm giác Aeon cổ điển. all GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2, June 1991 http://forum.kodi.tv/showthread.php?tid=210069 https://github.com/mikesilvo164/Aeon-Nox-SiLVO https://github.com/mikesilvo164/Aeon-Nox-SiLVO [B]Based on [I]v5.9.4[/I] of Aeon Nox 5[/B][CR][I]All Versions[/I][CR]- Misc fixes, changes, and improvements[CR][I]v6.0.2[/I][CR]- Rework InfoPanel options[CR]- Some Widget fixes[CR]- Add BigNoids LibreElec settings screen[CR]- Add BigNoids sortletter jump to ShowCase, Landscape, Shift, Logo, MyFlix, Rightlist, and Panel views[CR][I]v6.0.1[/I][CR]- Removed now, next, & channel listings from the EPG window[CR]- New search button options (taken from Estuary)[CR][I]v6.0.0[/I][CR]- Rework Widget settings[CR]- Move some Main Menu customizer functions to the context menu (can use mapped key or longpress of select/enter to bring up the context menu)[CR]- Numerous PVR changes and fixes[CR]- New Customization section in skin settings[CR]- Arial font fixes[CR]- Add user selectable login screen background[CR]- Add user selectable InfoPopup delay[CR][CR]For a full list of changes visit https://github.com/mikesilvo164/Aeon-Nox-SiLVO/commits/master

All the best from cCloud TV cCloud is an open source cloud based social IPTV service. It is built by the community for the community, where streaming is just a click away. Just click, play and stream. Yes, it's that simple. Just go to [COLOR blue]http://ccloudtv.org[/COLOR] and enjoy:) Please report any channels that are down here [COLOR blue]http://www.tiny.cc/reportchs[/COLOR] Users can now check servers status which can be found at [COLOR blue]http://ccloudtv.org/status[/COLOR]
http://www.gnu.org/licenses/ http://ccloudtv.org/forum http://ccloudtv.org http://facebook.com/ccloudapp http://twitter.com/ccloudapp

video audio image executable
Put all your favourites bits of all your favourites addons into one easy to use addon. Super Favourites is a better way of managing your Kodi Favourites.[CR][CR]Virtually any menu item within Kodi can be added to Super Favourites, even from addons that don't normally provide this feature.[CR][CR]Super Favourites allows you to better manage your Kodi favourites, including the creation of sub-folders, into which your Kodi favourites can then be copied or moved into.[CR][CR]This allows you to create you own custom addon with just the best bits of your favourite addons. Search your favourite addons, play your favourite music, read your favourite comic strips, select your favourite playlists, browse your favourite movies, listen to your favourite radio stations, watch your favourite cartoons, the possibilities are endless, all from within one easy to use addon. all en GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991 http://forum.xbmc.org/showthread.php?tid=192662
http://iaincstott.co.uk/KodiRepo/Addons/plugin.program.super.favourites seanpoyser at gmail.com
1.0.60: 29th May 2017 - 'Now playing' text now defined by SF due to skin variations
$ADDON[plugin.program.super.favourites 30002] !IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(SF_STD_CONTEXTMENU_ENABLED)) + !StringCompare(Container.PluginName,plugin.program.super.favourites)
$ADDON[plugin.program.super.favourites 30047] !IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(SF_STD_ADDTOFAVES_ENABLED)) + !StringCompare(Container.PluginName,plugin.program.super.favourites)
$ADDON[plugin.program.super.favourites 30259] !IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(SF_STD_DOWNLOAD_ENABLED)) + Player.IsInternetStream
